thread.title: Greece a warning for Australia: Morrison
thread.title_full: Greece a warning for Australia: Morrison

title: Greece a warning for Australia: Morrison
text:
View Photo 

Federal government frontbencher Scott Morrison says the Greek crisis should be a "distant" warning for Australians as the country prepares to vote in a referendum on Sunday on whether it accepts another round of austerity measures. 
Mr Morrison said Greece has been aware of its financial problems surrounding an ageing population since the 1980s, and while it has undertaken significant reforms in recent years, he believes it was too little too late. 
"We're seeing pictures of pensioners today in Greece crying, sitting on the streets, just in absolute despair. Well, I don't want to see that happen to future pensioners in Australia," the social services minister told Network Ten on Sunday. @YahooNZBusiness on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Greece a warning to everyone: Morrison AAP 
Federal government frontbencher Scott Morrison says what is happening in Greece is a warning of what can happen â€¦
